title: Get ready for Firefly 0.3!
description:
Hot off the press is Firefly 0.3! Firefly is a simple URL shortener application intended for personal use. It’s core features are:
 Very light-weight - based on Sinatra Shorten URLs using 62-Base encoding Offers an easy to use API Keeps track of URL clicks Supports most popular database backends, including MySQL and Sqlite3 Includes a ready-to-use Bookmarklet Works with any Rack capable web server  Interested? Give it a go!
